title: Google\Cloud\ContactCenterInsights\V1\Conversation\Transcript\TranscriptSegment
name: TranscriptSegment
description:
A segment of a full transcript.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.contactcenterinsights.v1.Conversation.Transcript.TranscriptSegment

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.message_time
params.description: The time that the message occurred, if provided.

params.name: data.confidence
params.description: A confidence estimate between 0.0 and 1.0 of the fidelity of this segment. A default value of 0.0 indicates that the value is unset.

params.name: data.words
params.description: A list of the word-specific information for each word in the segment.

params.name: data.language_code
params.description: The language code of this segment as a BCP-47 language tag. Example: "en-US".

params.name: data.channel_tag
params.description: For conversations derived from multi-channel audio, this is the channel number corresponding to the audio from that channel. For audioChannelCount = N, its output values can range from '1' to 'N'. A channel tag of 0 indicates that the audio is mono.

params.name: data.dialogflow_segment_metadata
params.description: CCAI metadata relating to the current transcript segment.
